Text.Page:
Yes, the kulkari are a thorn in our sides, but we've got other problems. {@LinkCreature:21#7#yurklag hyenas} and {@LinkCreature:21#14#desert arachnen workers} are the immediate threat.

I've heard you're good at killing things. Now's your chance to prove it!
Now that we're not lined up for some beast's lunch, we can get a lot done. You're a good soldier, <PCNAME>. Thanks.
